Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 3rd overall pick, by St. Louis in 1975...
Earned first career win on 5/12/1978...
Injured on 5/23/1984 with a Torn Tricep Muscle, out for full season...
Traded from St. Louis to Cincinnati on 1/31/1987 (Going to CIN: P L. Smith. Going to STL: P N. Charlton)...
Traded from Cincinnati to St. Louis on 7/14/1990 (Going to CIN: 2B M. Lemke, 1B T. Martinez, C P. Clark. Going to STL: 2B S. Sax, P T. Henke, P L. Smith, RF B. Brower, SS J. Valdez)...
Was selected to the 1993 Allstar game...
Won World Series with St. Louis in 1993...
Signed as a free agent by New York (N) on 2/1/1994 to a 1-year deal worth $5,500,000 per year...
Traded from New York (N) to Atlanta on 6/9/1994 (Going to ATL: P L. Smith, P F. Rodriguez, RF B. Huskey. Going to NYM: P D. Righetti)...
Signed as a free agent by Philadelphia on 2/14/1995 to a 1-year deal worth $3,000,000 per year...
Injured on 9/29/1995 with a Torn Tricep Muscle, out for 4-5 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Philadelphia on 2/14/1996 to a 1-year deal worth $3,000,000 per year...
